EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in August 2014
EmailTemplate.name: Administration Notice for 19th September
EmailTemplate.subject: Administration Notice for 19th September
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
We hope you are all doing well this week.
Please note that school administration will operate from 8:30am - 3:45pm on Friday, 19th September. All administrative offices including accounts and the uniform shop will close at 3:45pm.
This applies to both Krylatskoe and Rosinka campuses.
Thank you.
Kind Regards,
Administration Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ {!User.School_List_Email_Footer__c}
